[Deadshot462 (mod) - Topic title updated to prevent multiple thread creations]

Edited August 24, 2012 by deadshot462
Me gusta. I mainly like the whole strategy part not the Minecraft blockiness part.

Does seem really cool. I wouldn't say it's specifically related to Minecraft, it can relate to many RTS fans. As an old fan of the Age of Empires series, I'm looking forward to how this game turns out.
After watching the intro video, this seems nothing like minecraft. I'm mostly interested in the physics because of how weird they were in minecraft.

If people like minecraft and KSP, there's a good chance they'll like: Minecraft in space!

Okay, it's actually called Blockade Runner, but it's pretty much minecraft in space, at the moment anyway.

http://blockaderunnergame.com/
